transitions.human_approval: Discovery complete: PHASE_TEMPLATES usage analyzed, coding standards researched, 5 open questions identified. Ready for planning decisions.

Planning complete: 5 key decisions made (execution modes, transition security model, custom workflows, type hints, loading strategy), work breakdown defined (4 phases, 7 days), implementation sequence established. Ready for design phase with concrete schemas and Pydantic models.

Design complete: YAML schema defined (workflows.yaml with 5 workflows), Pydantic models designed (WorkflowConfig, WorkflowTemplate), migration strategy documented (ProjectManager + PhaseStateEngine updates), 3 Mermaid sequence diagrams, strict QA enforcement rules (10/10 for all files including tests), extended TDD cycle with QA step. Ready for implementation.
Discovery findings documented: current architecture analyzed, requirements validated, edit modes designed, edge cases identified. Ready for detailed planning.
Planning complete: API finalized, algorithms designed (line edits/search/replace/diff), test strategy defined, 6-phase implementation roadmap created. Ready for detailed design artifacts.

Discovery complete: Label usage analyzed (60+ labels, 8 categories), WorkflowConfig pattern studied, GitHub API requirements documented, schema structure designed, 3 open questions answered (Q1: strict validation, Q2: warn during migration, Q3: explicit sync), risks identified. Ready for planning: work breakdown, API contracts, test strategy, labels.yaml content decisions.

Planning complete: Work breakdown defined (4 phases, 7-9 hours), API contracts specified (LabelConfig, Label dataclass, validation methods), test strategy outlined (unit/integration scenarios, 100% coverage target), labels.yaml content decided (~50 labels across 6 categories), migration strategy established (additive → warning → strict), implementation sequence planned (4-day roadmap). Ready for design: class structures, field types, validation logic, error handling, detailed method implementations.
